# Covariance and Contravariance

> Documentation for Covariance and Contravariance.

- [Creating Variant Generic Interfaces](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/creating-variant-generic-interfaces.md): Learn more about: Creating Variant Generic Interfaces (Visual Basic)
- [Covariance and Contravariance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/index.md): Learn more about: Covariance and Contravariance (Visual Basic)
- [Using Variance for Func and Action Generic Delegates](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/using-variance-for-func-and-action-generic-delegates.md): Learn more about: Using Variance for Func and Action Generic Delegates (Visual Basic)
- [Using Variance in Delegates](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/using-variance-in-delegates.md): Learn more about: Using Variance in Delegates (Visual Basic)
- [Using Variance in Interfaces for Generic Collections](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/using-variance-in-interfaces-for-generic-collections.md): Learn more about: Using Variance in Interfaces for Generic Collections (Visual Basic)
- [Variance in Delegates](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/variance-in-delegates.md): Learn more about: Variance in Delegates (Visual Basic)
- [Variance in Generic Interfaces](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/variance-in-generic-interfaces.md): Learn more about: Variance in Generic Interfaces (Visual Basic)
